Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Knidian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay fine red-brown. Circular stamp.
Curator's comments: Pencil, circled, obscured. Names, Theudotos, Diopeithes. The piece was known to Virginia Grace, but does not appear to have a KT number. Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0315)
